talks.title: Mocks in Elixir
talks.speaker: Andriy Mykulyak
talks.description: This talk is about mocks and mocking techniques in Elixir. The truth is, when we (software engineers) hear "mock", we almost unconciously start thinking about writing tests. But also the truth is, that mocks can be used in many more situations and with greater effects. When ? How ? Come and see for yourselves.
